name: Lovio George
tagline: We're curious. We work hard. We make a difference.
description: We were born in the heart of Detroit. Nearly 30 years ago, we set up shop in a house on Forest, and we’re still here. Still breaking rules. Still growing businesses. Still doing work that matters. We’re playful but professional, obsessed with results, and connected to our clients – in many cases over decades-long relationships. More than anything we’re developing communication programs that deliver.
